ygData.subject: Re: Quick question re: choices of primary & secondary w eapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... not until level 42.  so what i did was go into the tunnel in between east commons and north ro, way back in the corner of the room with the shady
ygData.messageBody:
> Is there a less dangerous brass song that I can use later to
> work on my brass skill? I still don't like the idea of
> leaving myself playing Discord overnight in some remote
> location to work on the skill.
>

not until level 42. so what i did was go into the tunnel in between east
commons and north ro, way back in the corner of the room with the shady
swashbuckler. i got lots of food and water (though i don't think you can
die without it, just not regain stamina), put on my horn, put on my afk/anon
tags, started discord and went to sleep. woke up from 5 to 150 brass.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 44 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
